author: sunce86.
content:
Hi all, one more question regarding specification:
class Block:
    base_fee_per_gas: int = 0 # default to 1,000,000,000 for blocks before INITIAL_FORK_BLOCK_NUMBER
What is the meaning of the comment? Is 1,000,000,000 a starting value to calculate base fee of the first block after INITIAL_FORK_BLOCK_NUMBER?

author: abdel.stark
content: Base fee at INITIAL_FORK_BLOCK_NUMBER will be 1,000,000,000  yes. Because base fee of block N depends on block N - 1. So we need an initial value
